Instruccion: Unscramble the sentences about the party.
Unscramble the sentences adding will to make questions about the future.

opciones: we / have / the technology to stop asteroid?
respuestas: Will we have the technology to stop asteroid?

opciones: scientists / find / dinosaur DNA in their bones?
respuestas: Will scientists find dinosaur DNA in their bones?

opciones: When / you / finish / your dinosaur project?
your project / have / a lot of pictures?
respuestas: Will your project have a lot of pictures?

opciones: happens / What / you / if / in the sun a lot / are / ?
respuestas: What happens if you are in the sun a lot?

opciones: get a rash / he / Does / eats / if / he / seafood?
respuestas: Does he get a rash if he eats seafood?

opciones: when / happens / What / arrive / you / late at school?
respuestas: What happens when you arrive late at school?

opciones: study / you / Do / if / have / you / next day / a quiz?
respuestas: Do you study if you have a quiz next day?

opciones: When you play with a dog, / ears or tail / its / pull / don't
respuestas: When you play with a dog, don't pull its ears or tail.

opciones: When you meet a strange cat / try to / you / shouldn't / it / touch
respuestas: When you meet a strange cat, you shouldn't try to touch it.

opciones: When you pick up a rabbit, / lift / don't / by it's ears / it
respuestas: When you pick up a rabbit, don't lift it by it's ears.

opciones: if a cat is with her kittens / get / you / mustn't / too close
respuestas: If a cat is with her kittens, you mustn't get too close.
